1980_1999.title: Al-kompars
1980_1999.plot: Salem dreams of being an actor but is still working in a gas station, only his love for Nada can make things easier for him.

2000_2009.title: Death of a Government Clerk
2000_2009.plot: An adaptation of the Russian author Anton Checkoff's short story about fragile clerk who accidentally finds himself in a strange confrontation with a VIP.

2013_2015.title: Ladder to Damascus
2013_2015.plot: Ghalia is inhabited by the soul of Zeina, a girl who drowned the day she was born. Haunted by Zeina's past life, Ghalia travels to Damascus to study acting and understand her present ... See full summary

2019_2022.title: Timelife
2019_2022.plot: A poet chooses to give birth alone at home surrounded by characters pregnant with their dreams. The narrative takes root in each moment of reality. The truth extracted from context is fictionalized. A way of staging life.
